title: Documentation

body:
#td-cover-block-0 { background-image: url(/neverpile-eureka-documentation/neverpile-background_hu5c06279a23f411534939f2b93f311c05_662371_960x540_fill_catmullrom_center_2.png); } @media only screen and (min-width: 1200px) { #td-cover-block-0 { background-image: url(/neverpile-eureka-documentation/neverpile-background_hu5c06279a23f411534939f2b93f311c05_662371_1920x1080_fill_catmullrom_center_2.png); } } Welcome to the neverpile eureka documentation site Learn More Get the sources The document archive system for the cloud generation

 Neverpile eureka takes the pain out of maintaining document archives by leveraging modern, cloud-era technology without sacrificing data integrity and auditability. Reduce to the max! Neverpile eureka gets rid of all the dead weight that makes traditional ECM and archiving systems a pain to maintain and instead focuses on what's important: keeping your data safe.
 Contributions welcome! We do a Pull Request contributions workflow on GitHub. New users are always welcome!
Read more …
 Contact us! solutions@levigo.de
